DOC.brief_title: Internet Delivered CBT Body Dysmorphic Disorder
DOC.criteria: outpatient ≥ 18 year primary diagnosis BDD accord DSM5 BDDYBOCS ≥20 regular access computer Internet access skill use web . psychotropic medication change within two month prior treatment , complete CBT BDD within last 12 month , primary axis I diagnosis current substance dependence lifetime bipolar disorder psychosis suicidal ideation Axis II diagnosis could jeopardize treatment participation , current psychological treatment could affect BDD symptoms A serious medical illness precludes participation study
